alert.note: Alert for Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 1:48PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern New Castle, western Kent, Talbot, Queen Anne`s, Caroline and Kent Counties through 215 PM EST... At 147 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hollywood Beach to near Kent Point. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Easton, Centerville, Talbot, Smyrna, Chestertown, Denton, Centreville, Camden, Clayton, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Cheswold, Rock Hall, St. Michaels, Church Hill, Preston, Millington and Sudlersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
